all.name: Colina King Bed
all.desc: Febonic range of Beds brings impeccable aesthetics and design value to your interiors. It is made with finest fabric and takes hours of craftsmanship before we ship it to our beloved customers.

all.name: Glorious King Size
all.desc: Fulfilling Dreams is like a fine delicacy that is desired by many, but enjoyed by few. Here you will find the perfect combination of your dreams & our passion coming together to make your design dreams come true. Whether our furniture becomes the centrepiece of your freshly designed room or a perfect accent to existing decor, we deliver furniture for your individual needs.Upholstered Beds are covered in light padding and fabric which gives a textural appeal; they could be made with velvet, leatherette, suede or simple fabric upholstery and typically have tufted or straight streamlined headboards.

all.name: Abstract King Size Bed
all.desc: The journey of Prava started with one crucial question, Why is furniture a lifetime decision? The answer was pretty simple - because it is not easy for people to change their furniture. Devising a solution to this was the genesis of Prava - the only lifestyle brand in India with limited edition annual collections and a unique programme that makes it easy to change the look of your home.This minimal yet plush, fully upholstered bed has a pleasingly rounded and soft form. Its well-cushioned, winged headboard is perfect for nestling into and is available in subtle, solid hues.

all.name: Tyne Solid Wood Lounge Chair
all.desc: Amberville is synonymous to a stately and gracious living. Taking inspiration from the classic colonial style of furniture prevalent during the 1800s,the Amberville Colonial line reflects distinct curved lines, classically proportioned form, symmetrical moldings and trims having a very smooth and superior finish, which evoke a sense of nostalgia.

all.name: Rome 2 Seater Sofa
all.desc: ARRA caters to a range of furniture which is knock down, multipurpose in use, simple styles, light weight, easy to use, comfortable, with distinct and unforgettable experience. ARRA is dedicated to fostering freedom in design in home Furniture. The makers of ARRA carry 14 years of experience in furniture industry.A Sofa cum Bed is a multi-functional piece of furniture, its a sofa or divan by day, flipped into a double bed at night. Available in different styles like the simple foldable or the pull out or convertible version.

all.name: Kosmo Harmony Coffee Table
all.desc: Kosmo furniture offers a wide range of furniture that is strong, durable and tough. It comes from the house of Spacewood, which is Indias largest furniture manufacturer. These products are made from melamine and membrane finish technology with an Iso: 9001, 18001, 14001 approved quality standards. All our products go through stringent quality checks to provide you the best of best at the most durable prices.

all.name: Archie Coffee Table
all.desc: Bantia Furniture most trusted company is in the business for last 65 years. Bantia Furnitures has become synonymous with quality because of consistent endeavor and personal sourcing coupled with attractive prices.Beginning in 1880, the word recliner was used to describe a type of chair. A recliner is an armchair or sofa that reclines when the occupant lowers the chair's back and raises its front. It has a backrest that can be tilted back, and often a footrest that may be extended by means of a lever on the side of the chair, or may extend automatically when the back is reclined.
